evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for hosting its solutions, ensuring scalability and compliance with industry standards.
Infinite Biomedical Technologies follows HIPAA regulations to safeguard patient data and implement FHIR for electronic health information exchange.
Integration with third-party health systems is facilitated via secure REST APIs, as mentioned in their developer documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant X12 or clearinghouse use cases identified on their site.
